posts.post_content:
Hi

Looking for the following in any grade. 

 N332 SF Hess : WM Cummins, George Cartwright, Malcolm Ford

 N344 Bravo/Between the Acts: Brown, Ennis, Guyon, Hazael, Hart, Merritt, O'Leary, Panghott, Ed. P. Weston

 N174 Goodwin's Celebrities and Prizefighters: Atkinson

 N29 and N43 Allen & Ginter – N29: McCormick, Paulsen, N43: Barry, Clark, Cummings, Ford, Myers, Ray 

Thanks for looking

Best,
Ed

Ed - nice wantlist :-)

Does that mean you have the other cards in each set you didn't list? I really need a decent Edwards from the N43 set as well as a few lower grade commons. I have a few of the cards you're missing in my lower grade set that I'd trade for something if you have anything I need (Barry, Ford, Myers, Ray). They are entrenched in my set otherwise. I also have Wood in an SGC 86 I'd like to move should you be interested in a condition rarity.

I may have an N29 Paulsen - if I find it I'll lyk.

As for the BTA athletes I have some extras including the Hart card. They are packed but probably accessible. Think I need about 125. each except the Hart. Weston on my list as well - tough card!

Please don't start collecting Goodwin or Kimball champions - I'm having a hard enough time as it is :-)
